label: 10X Cell Ranger
info: Simple secondary analysis of the gene-barcode matrix output of 10X Cell Ranger pipeline
instructions:
- Specify the Cell Ranger data directory
 - Specify the desired workflow and parameters
 - Click [ Run ]

categories.label: Input
categories.info: 10X Cell Ranger pipeline dataset directory. It should contain a sub-directory named 'outs'

visr.param.data_dir_10x.label: 10X dataset directory
visr.param.data_dir_10x.info: 10X Cell Ranger dataset directory. It should contain a sub-directory named 'outs'

visr.param.output_dir.label: Output Directory to save the results
visr.param.output_dir.info: Output directory where the analysis results will be saved to

visr.param.create_subdir.label: Create new sub-direcory
visr.param.create_subdir.info: Create a new sub directory with the name DATE_TIME (YYYYMMDD_hhmmss)

categories.label: Output cells table
categories.info: The analysis table of cells together with precomputed dimensionality reduction and clustering results.

visr.param.include_umi_counts.label: Include total UMI counts
visr.param.include_umi_counts.info: Include a column with total number of UMIs for each cell in the output table?

visr.param.include_tsne.label: Include t-SNE projection
visr.param.include_tsne.info: Include t-SNE projections (2 columns) in the output table?

visr.param.include_pca.label: Include PCA projection
visr.param.include_pca.info: Include PCA projections in the output table (10 columns: PCA.1 to PCA.10)?

visr.param.include_kmeans.label: Include k-means results
visr.param.include_kmeans.info: Include precomputed kmeans clusterings in the output table (9 columns: kmeans.2 to kmeans.10)?

visr.param.include_genecounts.label: Include counts for genes
visr.param.include_genecounts.info: Include counts for the genes specified below.

visr.param.gene_list.label: Gene list to export and plot (comma separated)
visr.param.gene_list.info: Comma separated list of genes to export to the output table and plot

categories.label: Differential expression analysis
categories.info: The analysis table of genes together with the differential expression analysis results

visr.param.de_only_significant.label: Export significant genes only
visr.param.de_only_significant.info: Only export genes that were significant in atleast one of the clusters. Uncheck to export all genes.

visr.param.all_de_columns.label: Include all columns in DE output table
visr.param.all_de_columns.info: Whether to specify columns you want to be exported to the DE analysis output table. By default all columns are selected

visr.param.de_include_sum_a.label: Include sum of inside cluster counts (A)

visr.param.de_include_sum_b.label: Include sum of outside cluster counts (B)

visr.param.de_include_mean_a_sizenorm.label: Include mean of inside cluster counts (A)

visr.param.de_include_mean_b_sizenorm.label: Include mean of outside cluster counts (B)

categories.label: Visualization Options
categories.info: Visualization of pre-computed results under a 2D t-SNE projection

visr.param.visualize_tsne_umi.label: Plot t-SNE for total UMI count (log10)

visr.param.vis_umi_min_value.label: UMI min saturate value
visr.param.vis_umi_min_value.info: min saturate UMI value on the color bar

visr.param.vis_umi_max_value.label: UMI max saturate value
visr.param.vis_umi_max_value.info: max saturate UMI value on the color bar

visr.param.vis_min_value.label: Gene min saturate value
visr.param.vis_min_value.info: min saturate value on the color bar for gene marker plots

visr.param.vis_max_value.label: Gene max saturate value
visr.param.vis_max_value.info: max saturate value on the color bar for gene marker plots

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_n_genes.label: Number of genes to show per cluster
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_n_genes.info: Number of top differentially expressed genes to show per cluster in the heatmap

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_min.label: Heatmap min saturate value
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_min.info: min saturate value on the color bar

visr.param.cluster_heatmap_max.label: Heatmap max saturate value
visr.param.cluster_heatmap_max.info: max saturate value on the color bar
